00043 int ofx_proc_security_cb(struct OfxSecurityData data, void * security_data)
00044 {
00045   char dest_string[255];
00046   cout<<"ofx_proc_security():\n";
00047   if(data.unique_id_valid==true){
00048     cout<<"    Unique ID of the security being traded: "<<data.unique_id<<"\n";
00049   }
00050   if(data.unique_id_type_valid==true){
00051     cout<<"    Format of the Unique ID: "<<data.unique_id_type<<"\n";
00052   }
00053   if(data.secname_valid==true){
00054     cout<<"    Name of the security: "<<data.secname<<"\n";
00055   }
00056   if(data.ticker_valid==true){
00057     cout<<"    Ticker symbol: "<<data.ticker<<"\n";
00058   }
00059   if(data.unitprice_valid==true){
00060     cout<<"    Price of each unit of the security: "<<data.unitprice<<"\n";
00061   }
00062   if(data.date_unitprice_valid==true){
00063     strftime(dest_string,sizeof(dest_string),"%c %Z",localtime(&(data.date_unitprice)));
00064     cout<<"    Date as of which the unitprice is valid: "<<dest_string<<"\n";
00065   }
00066   if(data.currency_valid==true){
00067     cout<<"    Currency of the unitprice: "<<data.currency<<"\n";
00068   }
00069   if(data.memo_valid==true){
00070     cout<<"    Extra transaction information (memo): "<<data.memo<<"\n";
00071   }
00072   cout<<"\n";
00073   return 0;
00074 }

00076 int ofx_proc_transaction_cb(struct OfxTransactionData data, void * transaction_data)
00077 {
00078   char dest_string[255];
00079   cout<<"ofx_proc_transaction():\n";
00080   
00081   if(data.account_id_valid==true){
00082     cout<<"    Account ID : "<<data.account_id<<"\n";
00083   }
00084   
00085   if(data.transactiontype_valid==true)
00086     {
00087       if(data.transactiontype==OFX_CREDIT)
00088         strncpy(dest_string, "CREDIT: Generic credit", sizeof(dest_string));
00089       else if (data.transactiontype==OFX_DEBIT)
00090         strncpy(dest_string, "DEBIT: Generic debit", sizeof(dest_string));
00091       else if (data.transactiontype==OFX_INT)
00092         strncpy(dest_string, "INT: Interest earned or paid (Note: Depends on signage of amount)", sizeof(dest_string));
00093       else if (data.transactiontype==OFX_DIV)
00094         strncpy(dest_string, "DIV: Dividend", sizeof(dest_string));
00095       else if (data.transactiontype==OFX_FEE)
00096         strncpy(dest_string, "FEE: FI fee", sizeof(dest_string));
00097       else if (data.transactiontype==OFX_SRVCHG)
00098         strncpy(dest_string, "SRVCHG: Service charge", sizeof(dest_string));
00099       else if (data.transactiontype==OFX_DEP)
00100         strncpy(dest_string, "DEP: Deposit", sizeof(dest_string));
00101       else if (data.transactiontype==OFX_ATM)
00102         strncpy(dest_string, "ATM: ATM debit or credit (Note: Depends on signage of amount)", sizeof(dest_string));
00103       else if (data.transactiontype==OFX_POS)
00104         strncpy(dest_string, "POS: Point of sale debit or credit (Note: Depends on signage of amount)", sizeof(dest_string));
00105       else if (data.transactiontype==OFX_XFER)
00106         strncpy(dest_string, "XFER: Transfer", sizeof(dest_string));
00107       else if (data.transactiontype==OFX_CHECK)
00108         strncpy(dest_string, "CHECK: Check", sizeof(dest_string));
00109       else if (data.transactiontype==OFX_PAYMENT)
00110         strncpy(dest_string, "PAYMENT: Electronic payment", sizeof(dest_string));
00111       else if (data.transactiontype==OFX_CASH)
00112         strncpy(dest_string, "CASH: Cash withdrawal", sizeof(dest_string));
00113       else if (data.transactiontype==OFX_DIRECTDEP)
00114         strncpy(dest_string, "DIRECTDEP: Direct deposit", sizeof(dest_string));
00115       else if (data.transactiontype==OFX_DIRECTDEBIT)
00116         strncpy(dest_string, "DIRECTDEBIT: Merchant initiated debit", sizeof(dest_string));
00117       else if (data.transactiontype==OFX_REPEATPMT)
00118         strncpy(dest_string, "REPEATPMT: Repeating payment/standing order", sizeof(dest_string));
00119       else if (data.transactiontype==OFX_OTHER)
00120         strncpy(dest_string, "OTHER: Other", sizeof(dest_string));
00121       else
00122         strncpy(dest_string, "Unknown transaction type", sizeof(dest_string));
00123       cout<<"    Transaction type: "<<dest_string<<"\n";
00124     }
00125 
00126   
00127   if(data.date_initiated_valid==true){
00128     strftime(dest_string,sizeof(dest_string),"%c %Z",localtime(&(data.date_initiated)));
00129     cout<<"    Date initiated: "<<dest_string<<"\n";
00130   }
00131   if(data.date_posted_valid==true){
00132     strftime(dest_string,sizeof(dest_string),"%c %Z",localtime(&(data.date_posted)));
00133     cout<<"    Date posted: "<<dest_string<<"\n";
00134   }
00135   if(data.date_funds_available_valid==true){
00136     strftime(dest_string,sizeof(dest_string),"%c %Z",localtime(&(data.date_funds_available)));
00137     cout<<"    Date funds are available: "<<dest_string<<"\n";
00138   }
00139   if(data.amount_valid==true){
00140     cout<<"    Total money amount: "<<setiosflags(ios::fixed)<<setiosflags(ios::showpoint)<<setprecision(2)<<data.amount<<"\n";
00141   }
00142   if(data.units_valid==true){
00143     cout<<"    # of units: "<<setiosflags(ios::fixed)<<setiosflags(ios::showpoint)<<setprecision(2)<<data.units<<"\n";
00144   }
00145   if(data.oldunits_valid==true){
00146     cout<<"    # of units before split: "<<setiosflags(ios::fixed)<<setiosflags(ios::showpoint)<<setprecision(2)<<data.oldunits<<"\n";
00147   }
00148   if(data.newunits_valid==true){
00149     cout<<"    # of units after split: "<<setiosflags(ios::fixed)<<setiosflags(ios::showpoint)<<setprecision(2)<<data.newunits<<"\n";
00150   }
00151   if(data.unitprice_valid==true){
00152     cout<<"    Unit price: "<<setiosflags(ios::fixed)<<setiosflags(ios::showpoint)<<setprecision(2)<<data.unitprice<<"\n";
00153   }
00154   if(data.fees_valid==true){
00155     cout<<"    Fees: "<<setiosflags(ios::fixed)<<setiosflags(ios::showpoint)<<setprecision(2)<<data.fees<<"\n";
00156   }
00157   if(data.commission_valid==true){
00158     cout<<"    Commission: "<<setiosflags(ios::fixed)<<setiosflags(ios::showpoint)<<setprecision(2)<<data.commission<<"\n";
00159   }
00160   if(data.fi_id_valid==true){
00161     cout<<"    Financial institution's ID for this transaction: "<<data.fi_id<<"\n";
00162   }
00163   if(data.fi_id_corrected_valid==true){
00164     cout<<"    Financial institution ID replaced or corrected by this transaction: "<<data.fi_id_corrected<<"\n";
00165   }
00166   if(data.fi_id_correction_action_valid==true){
00167     cout<<"    Action to take on the corrected transaction: ";
00168     if (data.fi_id_correction_action==DELETE)
00169       cout<<"DELETE\n";
00170     else if (data.fi_id_correction_action==REPLACE)
00171       cout<<"REPLACE\n";
00172     else
00173       cout<<"ofx_proc_transaction(): This should not happen!\n";
00174     }
00175   if(data.invtransactiontype_valid==true){
00176     cout<<"    Investment transaction type: ";
00177     if (data.invtransactiontype==OFX_BUYDEBT)
00178       strncpy(dest_string, "BUYDEBT (Buy debt security)", sizeof(dest_string));
00179     else if (data.invtransactiontype==OFX_BUYMF)
00180       strncpy(dest_string, "BUYMF (Buy mutual fund)", sizeof(dest_string));
00181     else if (data.invtransactiontype==OFX_BUYOPT)
00182       strncpy(dest_string, "BUYOPT (Buy option)", sizeof(dest_string));
00183     else if (data.invtransactiontype==OFX_BUYOTHER)
00184       strncpy(dest_string, "BUYOTHER (Buy other security type)", sizeof(dest_string));
00185     else if (data.invtransactiontype==OFX_BUYSTOCK)
00186       strncpy(dest_string, "BUYSTOCK (Buy stock))", sizeof(dest_string));
00187     else if (data.invtransactiontype==OFX_CLOSUREOPT)
00188       strncpy(dest_string, "CLOSUREOPT (Close a position for an option)", sizeof(dest_string));
00189     else if (data.invtransactiontype==OFX_INCOME)
00190       strncpy(dest_string, "INCOME (Investment income is realized as cash into the investment account)", sizeof(dest_string));
00191     else if (data.invtransactiontype==OFX_INVEXPENSE)
00192       strncpy(dest_string, "INVEXPENSE (Misc investment expense that is associated with a specific security)", sizeof(dest_string));
00193     else if (data.invtransactiontype==OFX_JRNLFUND)
00194       strncpy(dest_string, "JRNLFUND (Journaling cash holdings between subaccounts within the same investment account)", sizeof(dest_string));
00195     else if (data.invtransactiontype==OFX_MARGININTEREST)
00196       strncpy(dest_string, "MARGININTEREST (Margin interest expense)", sizeof(dest_string));
00197     else if (data.invtransactiontype==OFX_REINVEST)
00198       strncpy(dest_string, "REINVEST (Reinvestment of income)", sizeof(dest_string));
00199     else if (data.invtransactiontype==OFX_RETOFCAP)
00200       strncpy(dest_string, "RETOFCAP (Return of capital)", sizeof(dest_string));
00201     else if (data.invtransactiontype==OFX_SELLDEBT)
00202       strncpy(dest_string, "SELLDEBT (Sell debt security.  Used when debt is sold, called, or reached maturity)", sizeof(dest_string));
00203     else if (data.invtransactiontype==OFX_SELLMF)
00204       strncpy(dest_string, "SELLMF (Sell mutual fund)", sizeof(dest_string));
00205     else if (data.invtransactiontype==OFX_SELLOPT)
00206       strncpy(dest_string, "SELLOPT (Sell option)", sizeof(dest_string));
00207     else if (data.invtransactiontype==OFX_SELLOTHER)
00208       strncpy(dest_string, "SELLOTHER (Sell other type of security)", sizeof(dest_string));
00209     else if (data.invtransactiontype==OFX_SELLSTOCK)
00210       strncpy(dest_string, "SELLSTOCK (Sell stock)", sizeof(dest_string));
00211     else if (data.invtransactiontype==OFX_SPLIT)
00212       strncpy(dest_string, "SPLIT (Stock or mutial fund split)", sizeof(dest_string));
00213     else if (data.invtransactiontype==OFX_TRANSFER)
00214       strncpy(dest_string, "TRANSFER (Transfer holdings in and out of the investment account)", sizeof(dest_string));
00215     else 
00216       strncpy(dest_string, "ERROR, this investment transaction type is unknown.  This is a bug in ofxdump", sizeof(dest_string));
00217     
00218     cout<<dest_string<<"\n";
00219   }
00220   if(data.unique_id_valid==true){
00221     cout<<"    Unique ID of the security being traded: "<<data.unique_id<<"\n";
00222   }
00223   if(data.unique_id_type_valid==true){
00224     cout<<"    Format of the Unique ID: "<<data.unique_id_type<<"\n";
00225   }
00226   if(data.security_data_valid==true){
00227     ofx_proc_security_cb(*(data.security_data_ptr), NULL );
00228   }
00229 
00230   if(data.server_transaction_id_valid==true){
00231     cout<<"    Server's transaction ID (confirmation number): "<<data.server_transaction_id<<"\n";
00232   }
00233   if(data.check_number_valid==true){
00234     cout<<"    Check number: "<<data.check_number<<"\n";
00235   }
00236   if(data.reference_number_valid==true){
00237     cout<<"    Reference number: "<<data.reference_number<<"\n";
00238   }
00239   if(data.standard_industrial_code_valid==true){
00240     cout<<"    Standard Industrial Code: "<<data.standard_industrial_code<<"\n";
00241   }
00242   if(data.payee_id_valid==true){
00243     cout<<"    Payee_id: "<<data.payee_id<<"\n";
00244   }
00245   if(data.name_valid==true){
00246     cout<<"    Name of payee or transaction description: "<<data.name<<"\n";
00247   }
00248   if(data.memo_valid==true){
00249     cout<<"    Extra transaction information (memo): "<<data.memo<<"\n";
00250   }
00251   cout<<"\n";
00252   return 0;
00253 }//end ofx_proc_transaction()

00255 int ofx_proc_statement_cb(struct OfxStatementData data, void * statement_data)
00256 {
00257   char dest_string[255];
00258   cout<<"ofx_proc_statement():\n";
00259   if(data.currency_valid==true){
00260     cout<<"    Currency: "<<data.currency<<"\n";
00261   }
00262   if(data.account_id_valid==true){
00263     cout<<"    Account ID: "<<data.account_id<<"\n";
00264   }
00265   if(data.date_start_valid==true){
00266     strftime(dest_string,sizeof(dest_string),"%c %Z",localtime(&(data.date_start)));
00267     cout<<"    Start date of this statement: "<<dest_string<<"\n";
00268   }
00269   if(data.date_end_valid==true){
00270     strftime(dest_string,sizeof(dest_string),"%c %Z",localtime(&(data.date_end)));
00271     cout<<"    End date of this statement: "<<dest_string<<"\n";
00272   }
00273   if(data.ledger_balance_valid==true){
00274     cout<<"    Ledger balance: "<<setiosflags(ios::fixed)<<setiosflags(ios::showpoint)<<setprecision(2)<<data.ledger_balance<<"\n";
00275   }
00276   if(data.ledger_balance_date_valid==true){
00277     strftime(dest_string,sizeof(dest_string),"%c %Z",localtime(&(data.ledger_balance_date)));
00278     cout<<"    Ledger balance date: "<<dest_string<<"\n";
00279   }
00280   if(data.available_balance_valid==true){
00281     cout<<"    Available balance: "<<setiosflags(ios::fixed)<<setiosflags(ios::showpoint)<<setprecision(2)<<data.available_balance<<"\n";
00282   }
00283   if(data.available_balance_date_valid==true){
00284     strftime(dest_string,sizeof(dest_string),"%c %Z",localtime(&(data.available_balance_date)));
00285     cout<<"    Ledger balance date: "<<dest_string<<"\n";
00286   }
00287   if(data.marketing_info_valid==true){
00288     cout<<"    Marketing information: "<<data.marketing_info<<"\n";
00289   }
00290   cout<<"\n";
00291   return 0;
00292 }//end ofx_proc_statement()

00294 int ofx_proc_account_cb(struct OfxAccountData data, void * account_data)
00295 {
00296   cout<<"ofx_proc_account():\n";
00297   if(data.account_id_valid==true){
00298     cout<<"    Account ID: "<<data.account_id<<"\n";
00299     cout<<"    Account name: "<<data.account_name<<"\n";
00300   }
00301   if(data.account_type_valid==true){
00302     cout<<"    Account type: ";
00303     switch(data.account_type){
00304     case OfxAccountData::OFX_CHECKING : cout<<"CHECKING\n";
00305       break;
00306     case OfxAccountData::OFX_SAVINGS : cout<<"SAVINGS\n";
00307       break;
00308     case OfxAccountData::OFX_MONEYMRKT : cout<<"MONEYMRKT\n";
00309       break;
00310     case OfxAccountData::OFX_CREDITLINE : cout<<"CREDITLINE\n";
00311       break;
00312     case OfxAccountData::OFX_CMA : cout<<"CMA\n";
00313       break;
00314     case OfxAccountData::OFX_CREDITCARD : cout<<"CREDITCARD\n";
00315       break;
00316     case OfxAccountData::OFX_INVESTMENT : cout<<"INVESTMENT\n";
00317       break;
00318     default: cout<<"ofx_proc_account() WRITEME: This is an unknown account type!";
00319     }
00320   }
00321   if(data.currency_valid==true){
00322     cout<<"    Currency: "<<data.currency<<"\n";
00323   }
00324 
00325   if (data.bank_id_valid)
00326     cout<<"    Bank ID: "<<data.bank_id << endl;;
00327 
00328   if (data.branch_id_valid)
00329     cout<<"    Branch ID: "<<data.branch_id << endl;
00330 
00331   if (data.account_number_valid)
00332     cout<<"    Account #: "<<data.account_number << endl;
00333 
00334   cout<<"\n";
00335   return 0;
00336 }//end ofx_proc_account()

00340 int ofx_proc_status_cb(struct OfxStatusData data, void * status_data)
00341 {
00342   cout<<"ofx_proc_status():\n";
00343   if(data.ofx_element_name_valid==true){
00344     cout<<"    Ofx entity this status is relevent to: "<< data.ofx_element_name<<" \n";
00345   }
00346   if(data.severity_valid==true){
00347     cout<<"    Severity: ";
00348     switch(data.severity){
00349     case OfxStatusData::INFO : cout<<"INFO\n";
00350       break;
00351     case OfxStatusData::WARN : cout<<"WARN\n";
00352       break;
00353     case OfxStatusData::ERROR : cout<<"ERROR\n";
00354       break;
00355     default: cout<<"WRITEME: Unknown status severity!\n";
00356     }
00357   }
00358   if(data.code_valid==true){
00359     cout<<"    Code: "<<data.code<<", name: "<<data.name<<"\n    Description: "<<data.description<<"\n";
00360   }
00361   if(data.server_message_valid==true){
00362     cout<<"    Server Message: "<<data.server_message<<"\n";
00363   }
00364   cout<<"\n";
00365   return 0;
00366 }

00369 int main (int argc, char *argv[])
00370 {
00372   extern int ofx_PARSER_msg;
00373   extern int ofx_DEBUG_msg;
00374   extern int ofx_WARNING_msg;
00375   extern int ofx_ERROR_msg;
00376   extern int ofx_INFO_msg;
00377   extern int ofx_STATUS_msg;
00378 
00379   gengetopt_args_info args_info;
00380 
00381   /* let's call our cmdline parser */
00382   if (cmdline_parser (argc, argv, &args_info) != 0)
00383     exit(1) ;
00384 
00385   //  if (args_info.msg_parser_given)
00386   //    cout << "The msg_parser option was given!" << endl;
00387 
00388   //  cout << "The flag is " << ( args_info.msg_parser_flag ? "on" : "off" ) <<
00389   //    "." << endl ;
00390   args_info.msg_parser_flag ? ofx_PARSER_msg = true : ofx_PARSER_msg = false;
00391   args_info.msg_debug_flag ? ofx_DEBUG_msg = true : ofx_DEBUG_msg = false;
00392   args_info.msg_warning_flag ? ofx_WARNING_msg = true : ofx_WARNING_msg = false;
00393   args_info.msg_error_flag ? ofx_ERROR_msg = true : ofx_ERROR_msg = false;
00394   args_info.msg_info_flag ? ofx_INFO_msg = true : ofx_INFO_msg = false;
00395   args_info.msg_status_flag ? ofx_STATUS_msg = true : ofx_STATUS_msg;
00396 
00397   bool skiphelp = false;
00398   
00399   if(args_info.list_import_formats_given)
00400     {
00401       skiphelp = true;
00402       cout <<"The supported file formats for the 'input-file-format' argument are:"<<endl;
00403       for(int i=0; LibofxImportFormatList[i].format!=LAST; i++)
00404         {
00405           cout <<"     "<<LibofxImportFormatList[i].description<<endl;
00406         }
00407     }
00408                   
00409   LibofxContextPtr libofx_context = libofx_get_new_context();
00410 
00411   //char **inputs ; /* unamed options */
00412   //unsigned inputs_num ; /* unamed options number */
00413   if (args_info.inputs_num  > 0)
00414     {
00415       const char* filename = args_info.inputs[0];
00416 
00417 
00418       ofx_set_statement_cb(libofx_context, ofx_proc_statement_cb, 0);
00419       ofx_set_account_cb(libofx_context, ofx_proc_account_cb, 0);
00420       ofx_set_transaction_cb(libofx_context, ofx_proc_transaction_cb, 0);
00421       ofx_set_security_cb(libofx_context, ofx_proc_security_cb, 0);
00422       ofx_set_status_cb(libofx_context, ofx_proc_status_cb, 0);
00423 
00424       enum LibofxFileFormat file_format = libofx_get_file_format_from_str(LibofxImportFormatList, args_info.import_format_arg);
00426       if(args_info.inputs_num  > 1)
00427         {
00428           cout << "Sorry, currently, only the first file is processed as the library can't deal with more right now.  The following files were ignored:"<<endl;
00429           for ( unsigned i = 1 ; i < args_info.inputs_num ; ++i )
00430             {
00431               cout << "file: " << args_info.inputs[i] << endl ;
00432               }
00433         }
00434       libofx_proc_file(libofx_context, args_info.inputs[0], file_format);
00435     }
00436   else
00437     {
00438       if ( !skiphelp )
00439         cmdline_parser_print_help();
00440     }
00441   return 0;
00442 }
